page.title: 13CHANGE IN SUTTON ST JAMES
page.content: 2) {HOW LONG HAVE YOU LIVED IN THIS {HOUSE? }Five out of six people had either lived there all their lives or from an early age. One lady, now 84 has had five different addresses in the village, all very close to each other. 3) {WERE YOU, OR ANYONE IN YOUR {FAMILY, EVER INVOLVED IN SOME WAY WITH {THE LAND IN THIS AREA?}All interviewees had had, or still have, some connection with the land. One family buys all the grain grown by the local farmers, others had grown potatoes, strawberries, raspberries and flowers, most of the produce was sent to London or Leeds, but some strawberries were sold to a local canning factory.
